risk.model

Class RiskBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • risk.model.RiskBoard

  • public class RiskBoard
extends java.util.Observable
    This class implements the RiskBoard it contains all the elements of the board. continents and territories
    Version:
    2.4
    Author:
    hcanta
